verses.verse: Moreover the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> to me, saying, <WH559>
Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> set <WH7760> your face <WH6440> against <WH5921> mount <WH2022> Seir, <WH8165> and prophesy <WH5012> against <WH5921> it,

And say <WH559> to it, Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Behold, <WH2005> O mount <WH2022> Seir, <WH8165> I am against <WH413> you, and I will stretch <WH5186> out my hand <WH3027> against <WH5921> you, and I will make <WH5414> you most desolate. <WH8077>
I will lay <WH7760> your cities <WH5892> waste, <WH2723> and you shall be desolate, <WH8077> and you shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD. <WH3068>

Because <WH3282> you have had <WH1961> a perpetual <WH5769> hatred, <WH342> and have shed <WH5064> the blood of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> by the force <WH3027> of the sword <WH2719> in the time <WH6256> of their calamity, <WH343> in the time <WH6256> that their iniquity <WH5771> had an end: <WH7093>

Therefore, <WH3651> as I live, <WH2416> said <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> I will prepare <WH6213> you to blood, <WH1818> and blood <WH1818> shall pursue <WH7291> you: since <WH518> you have not hated <WH8130> blood, <WH1818> even blood <WH1818> shall pursue <WH7291> you.
Thus will I make <WH5414> mount <WH2022> Seir <WH8165> most <WH8077> desolate, <WH8077> and cut <WH3772> off from it him that passes <WH5674> out and him that returns. <WH7725>

And I will fill <WH4390> his mountains <WH2022> with his slain <WH2491> men: in your hills, <WH1389> and in your valleys, <WH1516> and in all <WH3605> your rivers, <WH650> shall they fall <WH5307> that are slain <WH2491> with the sword. <WH2719>
I will make <WH5414> you perpetual <WH5769> desolations, <WH8077> and your cities <WH5892> shall not return: <WH3427> and you shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD. <WH3068>

Because <WH3282> you have said, <WH559> These two <WH8147> nations <WH1471> and these two <WH8147> countries <WH776> shall be mine, and we will possess <WH3423> it; whereas the LORD <WH3068> was there: <WH8033>

Therefore, <WH3651> as I live, <WH2416> said <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> I will even do <WH6213> according to your anger, <WH639> and according to your envy <WH7068> which <WH834> you have used <WH6213> out of your hatred <WH8135> against them; and I will make myself known <WH3045> among them, when <WH834> I have judged <WH8199> you.

And you shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD, <WH3068> and that I have heard <WH8085> all <WH3605> your blasphemies <WH5007> which <WH834> you have spoken <WH559> against <WH5921> the mountains <WH2022> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> They are laid desolate, <WH8074> they are given <WH5414> us to consume. <WH402>
Thus with your mouth <WH6310> you have boasted <WH1431> against <WH5921> me, and have multiplied <WH6280> your words <WH1697> against <WH5921> me: I have heard <WH8085> them.
Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> When the whole <WH3605> earth <WH776> rejoices, <WH8055> I will make <WH6213> you desolate. <WH8077>

As you did rejoice <WH8057> at the inheritance <WH5159> of the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> because <WH5921> <WH834> it was desolate, <WH8074> so <WH3651> will I do <WH6213> to you: you shall be desolate, <WH8077> O mount <WH2022> Seir, <WH8165> and all <WH3605> Idumea, <WH123> even all <WH3605> of it: and they shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD. <WH3068>
